option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# ================================================= # Variables de Entorno para User Management API # ================================================= # IMPORTANTE: Este archivo NO se sube a GitHub # Cópialo como .env y configura tus valores
# ================================================= # BASE DE DATOS POSTGRESQL # ================================================= DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5432 DB_NAME=user_management DB_USERNAME=sordi005 DB_PASSWORD=dev123
# ================================================= # PGADMIN (Herramienta gráfica para PostgreSQL) # ================================================= PGADMIN_EMAIL=admin@example.com PGADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PGADMIN_PORT=5050
# ================================================= # APLICACIÓN SPRING BOOT # ================================================= SERVER_PORT=8086 SPRING_PROFILE=dev
# ================================================= # JWT (JSON Web Tokens) # ================================================= JWT_SECRET=mi_super_secreto_jwt_key_debe_tener_minimo_32_caracteres_para_ser_seguro JWT_EXPIRATION_MS=86400000
# ================================================= # LOGGING # ================================================= LOG_LEVEL_APP=DEBUG LOG_LEVEL_SECURITY=DEBUG SHOW_SQL=true
# ================================================= # ACTUATOR (Monitoring) # ================================================= ACTUATOR_ENDPOINTS=health,info,metrics

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Spring Data JPA Query Methods Reference
## Palabras Clave Principales
| Palabra Clave | Descripción | Ejemplo | |---------------|-------------|---------| | `find...By` | Buscar registros | `findByEmail(String email)` | | `get...By` | Alias para find | `getByUsername(String username)` | | `query...By` | Alias para find | `queryByFirstName(String name)` | | `count...By` | Contar registros | `countByActive(Boolean active)` | | `exists...By` | Verificar existencia | `existsByEmail(String email)` | | `delete...By` | Eliminar registros | `deleteByUsername(String username)` | | `remove...By` | Alias para delete | `removeByEmail(String email)` |
## Operadores Lógicos
| Operador | SQL Equivalente | Ejemplo | |----------|-----------------|---------| | `And` | `AND` | `findByFirstNameAndLastName(String first, String last)` | | `Or` | `OR` | `findByEmailOrUsername(String email, String username)` | | `Not` | `NOT` | `findByActiveNot(Boolean active)` |
## Comparadores
| Comparador | SQL Equivalente | Ejemplo | |------------|-----------------|---------| | `IsNull` | `IS NULL` | `findByEmailIsNull()` | | `IsNotNull` | `IS NOT NULL` | `findByEmailIsNotNull()` | | `Like` | `LIKE` | `findByFirstNameLike(String pattern)` | | `NotLike` | `NOT LIKE` | `findByFirstNameNotLike(String pattern)` | | `StartingWith` | `LIKE 'value%'` | `findByEmailStartingWith(String prefix)` | | `EndingWith` | `LIKE '%value'` | `findByEmailEndingWith(String suffix)` | | `Containing` | `LIKE '%value%'` | `findByFirstNameContaining(String substring)` | | `IgnoreCase` | `UPPER()` | `findByEmailIgnoreCase(String email)` | | `GreaterThan` | `>` | `findByAgeGreaterThan(Integer age)` | | `LessThan` | `<` | `findByAgeLessThan(Integer age)` | | `Between` | `BETWEEN` | `findByAgeBetween(Integer start, Integer end)` | | `In` | `IN` | `findByUsernameIn(Collection<String> usernames)` |
## Ordenamiento y Limitación
| Palabra Clave | Descripción | Ejemplo | |---------------|-------------|---------| | `OrderBy...Asc` | Ordenar ascendente | `findByActiveOrderByUsernameAsc(Boolean active)` | | `OrderBy...Desc` | Ordenar descendente | `findByActiveOrderByCreatedAtDesc(Boolean active)` | | `Top` | Limitar resultados | `findTop10ByActive(Boolean active)` | | `First` | Primer resultado | `findFirstByOrderByCreatedAtDesc()` | | `Distinct` | Resultados únicos | `findDistinctByLastName(String lastName)` |

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
@echo off echo ======================================== echo Configurando Variables de Entorno echo para User Management API echo ========================================
REM Base de Datos set DB_HOST=localhost set DB_PORT=5432 set DB_NAME=user_management set DB_USERNAME=dev_user set DB_PASSWORD=dev123
REM JWT set JWT_SECRET=mi_super_secreto_jwt_key_de_32_caracteres_minimo set JWT_EXPIRATION_MS=86400000
REM Logging set LOG_LEVEL_APP=DEBUG set LOG_LEVEL_SECURITY=DEBUG set SHOW_SQL=true
REM Actuator set ACTUATOR_ENDPOINTS=health,info,metrics
echo. echo ✅ Variables configuradas para esta sesión echo. echo Para hacerlas permanentes: echo 1. Panel de Control ^> Sistema ^> Variables de entorno echo 2. O usar: setx VARIABLE_NAME "valor" echo.
